1.text: WIDTH:  110

0.text: Passive: Ryze's other basic ability casts  reset Overload's cooldown and charge a  Rune stack that lasts 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent casts and stacks up to 2 times.
0.html: Passive: Ryze's other basic ability casts  reset Overload's cooldown and charge a Rune stack that lasts 4 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent casts and stacks up to 2 times.
markedPassages: reset
Rune

1.text: Active: Ryze unleashes a runic blast in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and consumes all  Rune stacks.
1.html: Active: Ryze unleashes a runic blast in the target direction that deals magic damage to the first enemy hit and consumes all Rune stacks.
markedPassages: Rune

2.text: If Ryze consumed 2 stacks, he gains  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
2.html: If Ryze consumed 2 stacks, he gains  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds.
markedPassages: bonus movement speed

3.text: Flux Bonus: Overload deals 10 / 40 / 70 / 100% (based on  Realm Warp's Rank)  increased damage and spreads to surrounding Fluxed enemies.
3.html: Flux Bonus: Overload deals 10 / 40 / 70 / 100% (based on Realm Warp's Rank) increased damage and spreads to surrounding Fluxed enemies.

0.text: Active: Ryze seizes the target enemy, dealing magic damage and  slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds.
0.html: Active: Ryze seizes the target enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing them by 35% for 1.5 seconds.

1.html: Flux Bonus: The target is rooted instead of slowed.

0.text: TARGET RANGE:  550

1.text: EFFECT RADIUS:  350

0.text:
Active: Ryze projects an orb upon the target enemy that deals magic damage.
The target and surrounding enemies are also marked with Flux for 3 seconds. Ryze's basic abilities against Flux targets consume the mark to become empowered with an additional effect.
0.html:
Active: Ryze projects an orb upon the target enemy that deals magic damage.

The target and surrounding enemies are also marked with Flux for 3 seconds. Ryze's basic abilities against Flux targets consume the mark to become empowered with an additional effect.

1.text: Flux Bonus: Spell Flux spreads farther.
1.html: Flux Bonus: Spell Flux spreads farther.
markedPassages: Flux

0.text: TARGET RANGE: 3000 / 1000

1.text: EFFECT RADIUS:  365 / 465 /  515

0.text: Passive:  Overload's  Flux empowered damage is increased.
0.html: Passive: Overload's Flux empowered damage is increased.
markedPassages: Overload's
Flux

1.text: Active: Ryze  channels for 2 seconds to open a portal beneath him, marking the target location as its destination and gaining  sight of the area. Ryze is able to act while channeling, but the portal will cancel if he is  interrupted.
1.html: Active: Ryze channels for 2 seconds to open a portal beneath him, marking the target location as its destination and gaining sight of the area. Ryze is able to act while channeling, but the portal will cancel if he is interrupted.
markedPassages: channels
sight
interrupted

2.text: Upon completion, Ryze and allied units within will  blink to the location and become  rooted,  disarmed,  silenced and  untargetable for 0.75 seconds.
2.html: Upon completion, Ryze and allied units within will blink to the location and become rooted, disarmed, silenced and untargetable for 0.75 seconds.
markedPassages: blink
rooted
disarmed
silenced
untargetable
